channel.title: Stop posting and vote instead
channel.description:
Its my idea to remove the ability to replay on topics in this sections and instead use some sort of voting system .
Posting is very much possible on their forum, sense its more spam/annoying shit talk I think their database should handle it instead.

item.title: Stop posting and vote instead
item.dc:creator: @putaz putaz
item.description:
@putaz wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:49, topic:396619"][quote author=putaz link=topic=493790.msg3692543#msg3692543 date=1312223388]

Why bother about his wrong spellings, he helped people to set up a server and he has given much afford to write the tutorial.
Give people help instead of talking shit, let people teaching themselves with your help. stop being duche.

Using third person when talking about yourself, go see a psychiatrist u duche!

Do I use a third person when I talk about myself? That doesn’t make sense
[/quote]
Third person: Snoopy has to pee
Normal: (Snoopy)I have to pee.

You see there’s a difference.[/quote]

I know what you mean it just didn’t make sense.

Read full topic

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:37, topic:396619”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=493790.msg3611979#msg3611979 date=1306663294]

Go to a party u fucking nerds who gives a shit about his English u guys try talk fucking Swedish or where ever he’s from.

2nd dislike the idea your trying to bring

Svenskarna är bög, därför jag talar inte svenska.
[/quote]

Gramatik fel din äckliga hora, knulla din feta mamma! folk från finland är fattiga och äckliga din slisk bög.
Wrong grammar don’t try to speak swe, finfag.

Ed your just so fucking retarded I’m going to use a translater for this.
Not entirely true, more than 50% of the network speak English so you must speak English so that everyone can understand what you say. It is absolutely not OK to harass someone because of he can not speak excellent English. if you can understand what he says even if his grammar is not parfekt so let it be[/quote]
you still mad bro?

item.title: Stop posting and vote instead
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:37, topic:396619”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=493790.msg3611979#msg3611979 date=1306663294]

Go to a party u fucking nerds who gives a shit about his English u guys try talk fucking Swedish or where ever he’s from.

2nd dislike the idea your trying to bring

Svenskarna är bög, därför jag talar inte svenska.
[/quote]

Gramatik fel din äckliga hora, knulla din feta mamma! folk från finland är fattiga och äckliga din slisk bög.
Wrong grammar don’t try to speak swe, finfag.

Ed your just so fucking retarded I’m going to use a translater for this.
Not entirely true, more than 50% of the network speak English so you must speak English so that everyone can understand what you say. It is absolutely not OK to harass someone because of he can not speak excellent English. if you can understand what he says even if his grammar is not parfekt so let it be[/quote]

The UN has deemed about six languages to be international, and most people accept English as being the international language; Swedish isn’t one of those six or so, and seeing you’re communicating to an international community, you need effectively to speak in an international language, and stop getting pissed off when they point out that you suck at English, seeing you’re failing to communicate correctly. It’s not everyone else’s fault that you don’t know an international language well enough to effectively communicate, it’s yours.

Furthermore, the translator generates much more coherent text than you do, so either use it or continue to be ridiculed… If someone makes fun of you because the translator sucks, then ask them for a better one…

Anyway, I doubt you’ll listen, because you’re autistic (literally)…

Read full topic

item.title: Stop posting and vote instead
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“Slysteeler, post:32, topic:396619”]Go to a party u fucking nerds who gives a shit about his English u guys try talk fucking Swedish or where ever he’s from.

2nd dislike the idea your trying to bring[/quote]

The thing is, I know I suck at Swedish (I only know a few words), which is why I don’t speak it. If I were to attempt it, I’d obviously be using a translator; which has much better grammar, and spelling than he is using.

The difference is key; I realize I suck at something so I don’t do it, while he doesn’t realize he sucks at something and constantly gets mad when people tell him he sucks at it.

Furthermore, I’m speaking the most accepted international language, so I don’t need to learn some language that only a handful of people speak.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop posting and vote instead
item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:28, topic:396619”]@ Ed, you clearly to stupid so I will tell you this. Just because someone thinks someone is retard doesn’t mean That the person is mad.
So because of The Emo was unable to read, I made the statement that hes retarded. So you clearly retarded as-well for assuming it?[/quote]

I know full well calling someone a retard doesn’t automatically mean they’re mad, but given the situation, you’re mad. Furthermore, your posts are difficult to read, and you constantly fail to convey your thoughts correctly, and then get mad at everyone else because you’re retarded. Anyway, you exhibit several low functioning autistic behaviors; you should get that checked out.

Read full topic

item.title: Stop posting and vote instead
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“uberpk3r, post:28, topic:396619”][ol][li][/li]
[li][/li][/ol]

Actually, the the line (“Its my idea to remove the ability to reply on topics in this sections and instead use some sort of voting system .”) means clear that it is this section I meant, those who do not understand it should perhaps look for an English teacher instead of me.

I do not think people are complaining about my English, yet the reason for that is that they are angry

Actually it was more like: [quote]Its my idea to remove the ability to replay on topics in this sections and instead use some sort of voting system .[/quote] which is harder to understand than [quote]Its my idea to remove the ability to reply on topics in this sections and instead use some sort of voting system .[/quote]

We aren’t complaining, and I personally don’t give a fuck what you are trying to say.

So because I Accidently wrote Replay instead of reply, it was impossible for you to understand what section i’m talking about? Sorry but now you just seem retarded.

Second, There is no “WE”. Theres is Emo-You and theres is other people.
oh and you don’t care? How come you always talking about my spelling or why do you always reply on my threads
Good job making a fool out of you.

@ Ed, you clearly to stupid so I will tell you this. Just because someone thinks someone is retard doesn’t mean That the person is mad.
So because of The Emo was unable to read, I made the statement that hes retarded. So you clearly retarded as-well for assuming it?[/quote]
What makes you think I’m emo? You clearly don’t know what it means, and since you don’t have anything else to say you pull your ‘emo’ card out of your pocket, and yes there’s we, me and the other people on moparscape website.
I didn’t understand what the fuck were you talking about since the words are in wrong order and your grammar is fucked up.

You know what’s funny? You keep saying people that they are “retarded”, “stupid” or something related to that, when you are the most retarded person in moparscape.

Read full topic
